Name: CBT With Yuuka Kazami
About the game: This is a unofficial derivative fangame of the Touhou Project. It complies with the official guidelines for derivative work. FEATURES Learn the basics of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy with Yuuka Kazami in this cute visual novel! Learn scientifically proven techniques to help manage your mental health problems! Cute art! Atmospheric Scenery! Easy going, casual visual novel gameplay! Engaging Dialogue! STORY After seeing an ad for some Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) lessons offered by none other then Yuuka Kazami, one of the most powerful Youkai in all of Gensokyo, you make your way towards the sunflower depot to meet her. She seems to mean well... for now.
